Translations.Text: Sapata bahu patha bisista akasara
niscaya tomaloka paraspara biraodhi kathata lipta
Birata rakha haya tara paraa yiye birata thake
Michaliyasakala dhbansa ha'omka
yisakala sandeha-sansayata nipatita, udasina
Sihamte sodhe, ‘pratidana dirasa ketiya ha’ba’
‘yidina sihamtaka ju'ita sasti diya ha’ba’
Koraa ha’ba, ‘tomaloke tomalokara sasti bhoga karaa, iyara babe'i tomaloke kharadhara karaichila’
Niscaya muttakbisakala thakiba jannatasamuhata arau nijaraa prabahita sthanata
te'omlokarara pratipalake te'omlokaka yi dana karaiba seya te'omloke anandacitte grahana karaiba; niscaya itipurbe e'omloka achila satkarmasila
raatira ati kama samaya te'omloke topanita kata'ichila
arau raatira sesa praharata te'omloke ksama praarthana karaichila
arau te'omlokara dhana-sampadata achila bhikharai arau bancitasakalara haka
Arau suniscita bisbasisakalara babe prthiraita bahuto nidarsana ache
arau tomalokara nijara majato ache. Tomaloke laksya nakaraa neki
arau akasata ache tomalokara jiraika arau pratisrauti diya sakalo bastu
Eteke akasa arau prthiraira pratipalakara sapata! Niscaya e'ito parama satya yenekai tomalokara katha koraato satya
Ibraahimara sanmanita atithira brttanta tomara ocarata ahichene
yetiya te'omloke te'omra ocarata ahile arau ka'le, ‘chalama’, uttarata teraom ka'le ‘chalama’. E'omloka dekhuna acinaki
Tara pichata te'om drautabharae gopane nija grhinira ocaralai ga’la arau eta sbasthabana go-poraali (bhaja) lai upasthita ga’la
tara pichata te'om se'ito te'omlokara sanmukhata raakhi ka’le, ‘aponaloke nakhaya neki’
phalata te'omlokara bisaye te'omra manata bhitira sancara ha’la. Te'omloke ka’le, ‘bhaya nakaraiba’; arau te'omloke te'omka ejana jnani putra santanara susambada dile
Tetiya te'omra strai cinamrai cinamrai aguraa'i ahile arau nijarae mukhata thaparaiya'i ka’le, brd'dha-bandhya (ra santana ha’ba)
Te'omloke ka’le, ‘tomara pratipalake e'itorae kaiche; niscaya te'om prajnamaya, sarbajna’
